00004 /* 
00005  * pthread_create wrapper for gprof compatibility
00006  * stolen from http://sam.zoy.org/doc/programming/gprof.html
00007  */
00008 
00009 #include <pthread.h>
00010 #include <sys/time.h>

00012 typedef struct wrapper_s
00013 {
00014     void * (*start_routine)(void *);
00015     void * arg;
00016 
00017     pthread_mutex_t lock;
00018     pthread_cond_t  wait;
00019 
00020     struct itimerval itimer;
00021 
00022 } wrapper_t;
00023 
00024 static void * wrapper_routine(void *);
00025 
00026 /* Same prototype as pthread_create; use some #define magic to
00027  * transparently replace it in other files */
00028 int gprof_pthread_create(pthread_t * thread, pthread_attr_t * attr,
00029                          void * (*start_routine)(void *), void * arg)
00030 {
00031     wrapper_t wrapper_data;
00032     int i_return;
00033 
00034     /* Initialize the wrapper structure */
00035     wrapper_data.start_routine = start_routine;
00036     wrapper_data.arg = arg;
00037     getitimer(ITIMER_PROF, &wrapper_data.itimer);
00038     pthread_cond_init(&wrapper_data.wait, NULL);
00039     pthread_mutex_init(&wrapper_data.lock, NULL);
00040     pthread_mutex_lock(&wrapper_data.lock);
00041 
00042     /* The real pthread_create call */
00043     i_return = pthread_create(thread, attr, &wrapper_routine,
00044                                             &wrapper_data);
00045 
00046     /* If the thread was successfully spawned, wait for the data
00047      * to be released */
00048     if(i_return == 0)
00049     {
00050         pthread_cond_wait(&wrapper_data.wait, &wrapper_data.lock);
00051     }
00052 
00053     pthread_mutex_unlock(&wrapper_data.lock);
00054     pthread_mutex_destroy(&wrapper_data.lock);
00055     pthread_cond_destroy(&wrapper_data.wait);
00056 
00057     return i_return;
00058 }
00059 
00060 /* The wrapper function in charge for setting the itimer value */
00061 static void * wrapper_routine(void * data)
00062 {
00063     /* Put user data in thread-local variables */
00064     void * (*start_routine)(void *) = ((wrapper_t*)data)->start_routine;
00065     void * arg = ((wrapper_t*)data)->arg;
00066 
00067     /* Set the profile timer value */
00068     setitimer(ITIMER_PROF, &((wrapper_t*)data)->itimer, NULL);
00069 
00070     /* Tell the calling thread that we don't need its data anymore */
00071     pthread_mutex_lock(&((wrapper_t*)data)->lock);
00072     pthread_cond_signal(&((wrapper_t*)data)->wait);
00073     pthread_mutex_unlock(&((wrapper_t*)data)->lock);
00074 
00075     /* Call the real function */
00076     return start_routine(arg);
00077 }
